description: An incident took place sixteen years ago causing many people to lose their lives, including the life of a 10 year old girl named Momoka - Ringo`s sister. The incident was caused by Kanba and Shoma`s parents, who were members of a terrorist organization at the time. Shoma tells Ringo about this, claiming that her sister`s death was their family`s fault.

titles.title: La ruota che gira intorno a noi
The Wheel That Spins Us Round
